title: Ed-tech sector creates 75,000 jobs in 5 years: India EdTech Consortium - Careers360
content: Ed-tech sector creates 75,000 jobs in 5 years: India EdTech Consortium  Careers360
description: IAMAI: Indian EdTech Consortium (IEC), which functions under the Internet and Mobile Association of India (IAMAI) also says that more than 50,000 professionals are working in the Indian ed-tech sector
